version_description: We have further improved the stability of the app. Enjoy your drive!
Live Traffic issue has been fixed.

• BLE improvements
• LiveTrack enhancements
• Bug fixes

• Live Track improvements
• 3D touch start action for Live Track
• Swipe back gesture
• Other bug fixes
We have further improved the stability of the app. Enjoy your drive!

Disabled permanent GPS usage
Improved background management
Enhanced power efficiency
Miscellaneous bug fixes
We have further improved the stability of the app. Enjoy your drive!
We have further improved the stability of the app. Enjoy your drive!

- iOS 11 adaptations
- Proper map display for users in South Korea
- Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements

The Bluetooth connection issue that prevented the navigator from connecting with the app after the restart has been fixed. Some minor UI issues have been fixed as well.

Enjoy your drive!

Please restart your iPhone immediately after installing this update.

The update contains a fix for BLE communication issues and other minor improvements. To benefit from this update, you must upgrade to iOS 11.0.0 or later.
